t: Amazon.com: Fluff & Tuff Dog Toys: Our Philosophy
s: Play Safe: All Fluff & Tuff toys meet the same strict standards set for manufacturing children’s plush toys in the United States, including ASTM F963-11 (Standard Consumer Safety Specs for Toy Safety), testing for lead, and Phthalates, and double scanning for foreign or metal objects.
